title: 乌克兰军方在顿涅茨克地区特尼附近与俄罗斯军队和卢汉斯克·雷吉（Luhansk Regi）的比洛霍利夫卡（Bilohorivka）进行了54次战斗。
content: Ukrainian military had 54 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region and Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Klischiyivka, Andriyivka, Stupochky and south to Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Orlivka, Tonenke, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka ，唐内斯克地区的诺瓦莫卡·利夫卡（Novomykhaylivka）和pobyeda，robotyne，staromayorske和Zaporizhzhia地区的Nort -West Verbove，乌克兰武装部队的总参谋长在晚上的报告中说
author: Live UA Map
